duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the venue in providing best-in-class service and hospitality for Guests.
Set big-picture direction for the venue and work alongside leaders and teams to ensure Guest satisfaction.
Ensure effective hiring, scheduling, and Associate development to build strong teams and drive team engagement.
Execute flawless operational activities, uphold processes and standards, and maximize financial performance.
Build relationships with the community and grow the brand through business functions.
Supervise venue leaders to provide best-in-class service and drive Associate engagement.
Forecast and control sales and expenses, delegate tasks, and hold direct reports accountable for budgets and spending.
Interact with Guests to check on the quality of their experience and leverage business metrics and trends to drive performance.
Cultivate relationships with community leaders and organizations to ensure strong connections.
Hold leaders accountable for managing venue operations and drive Guest and team safety and satisfaction.
Demonstrate Topgolf’s Core Values: Fun, One Team, Excellence, Edgy Spirit, and Caring.

skills.skill: Restaurant, hotel, or golf course management
High level of self-awareness and receptivity to change

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
